The face isn't connected with the mystery. It's just a reference to the film Mission to Mars, which is based on this face on Mars-
Once when I loaded up the game the background was the moon scene except there was a sandcastle on it.

Once when I loaded up the game the background was the moon scene except there was a sandcastle on it.

That easter egg was added before 0.17 and is now generally quite known. Good observation skills though.

The face isn't connected with the mystery. It's just a reference to the film Mission to Mars, which is based on this face on Mars-

I still like the thought that when you do something right Duna turns into a flyable craft.......
Easter Egg Detective MedwedianPresident ready for any flights (On weekends, i am at a boarding school from monday to friday)
I would say it's probably not a reference to the movie, just the face directly.
probably the signals have conections with the monoiths
How about connect the monoliths with lines on the map?
go to jool seach for sstv signals

I still like the thought that when you do something right Duna turns into a flyable craft.......

Lol Invader Zim style

Well if you are looking for Magic Boulder. I didn't found it yet, but i know where it is Nova was right, it is not orbiting Duna, and there is something on Ike that mapsat can't locate.

well it is magic Boulder that is orbiting Ike at altitude around ~10 km.

Edit: I was like spitting distance away from it........

Well if you are looking for Magic Boulder. I didn't found it yet, but i know where it is Nova was right, it is not orbiting Duna, and there is something on Ike that mapsat can't locate.

Inclination?

Inclination?

inclination as Altitude is unknown for know. i'm trying to find it again.
I'm sending a mission now to try and locate it, good find (if you actually found it).

Well i wrote a plugin that draws a line from active ship to Magic Boulder I know it's there. But i can't reach it, couse of it changing altitude and inclination ...

http://i.imgur.com/1Tc26.png numbers in the log windows in distance between ship and Boulder.

I'm curious about how you made that plugin, mind telling us?

Edited September 30, 2012 by mustwinfull

Cheater

There really is no glory in posting pics and locations that you only found through a hex editor and hacking plugin. Now, you've spoiled the fun for everyone.

Edited September 30, 2012 by Nibb31

Legal2K , please go away!

It is not about cheating! we have fun revealing this mystery the way Nova supposed to.

Edit: Nevermind. I don't know what the fuss is about.

Edited September 30, 2012 by mustwinfull

Woah guys he wrote a plugin! That is so bad! We should all hate on him for making an inventive way to find it! LEAGAL 2K IS THE WORST!

*facepalm*

Calm down everyone. No one complained about using MapSat to find stuff, why is everyone crying like this is the worst thing ever?

EDIT: How is it spoiled for everyone now? No one forced you to click the spoiler.
Agreed with Nutt007. Why are you reacting to this but not pictures of other things like the kraken or the stonehenge? It's not the end of the world if you saw a screenshot of an easter egg.

Woah guys he wrote a plugin! That is so bad! We should all hate on him for making an inventive way to find it! LEAGAL 2K IS THE WORST!

*facepalm*

Calm down everyone. No one complained about using MapSat to find stuff, why is everyone crying like this is the worst thing ever?

EDIT: How is it spoiled for everyone now? No one forced you to click the spoiler.

Exactly my thoughts. crying about me for spoiling things in 0.17 EASTER EGGS THREAD is same as .. well i have no idea but seems pretty childlike, IMHO..

Agreed with Nutt007. Why are you reacting to this but not pictures of other things like the kraken or the stonehenge? It's not the end of the world if you saw a screenshot of an easter egg.

I just thought it through and realised that no one should be complaining and anyway, I'm on a manual search for the boulder now.

Still legal, how did you make it, I'm curious?
